verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More, more about Jesus More, more about Jesus More of His saving fullness see More of His love who died for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More about Jesus would I know More of His grace to others show More of His saving fullness see More of His love who died for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More about Jesus let me learn More of His holy will discern Spirit of God my teacher be Showing the things of Christ to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More about Jesus in His word Holding communion with my Lord Hearing His voice in every line Making each faithful saying mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More about Jesus on His throne Riches in glory all His own More of His kingdom's sure increase More of His coming Prince of Peace{/lang-eng}
